p.s: Stipulate
Who did this test? I have stipulated before that we do full test as we know banned is useless.

I am grateful to you for your help.

Pathetic
The story he told was a pathetic attempt to cover up a lie.

p.ru: Верность, преданность, лояльность, верноподданство, вассальная зависимость
p.s: Allegiance
He tends to be a leader who is worthy of respect and allegiance.

p.ru: Сокращение, сжатие, сужение, стягивание, усадка, контракция, уменьшение, контрактура
p.s: Contraction
The full phrase without contractions is: "When the cat is away, the mice will play."

Pejorative
His pejorative comments about my essay upset me.

p.ru: Вместо того, чтобы; вместо; а не
p.s: Rather than
You have allowed your friends to die for you rather than face me yourself.
You have allowed your friends to die for you rather than face me yourself.

Beseech
I do beseech you, sir. Be not out with me.

This cyclist seems to be invincible. He wins the sixth race this month.
